text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Mymensingh Division | native_name = ময়মনসিংহ বিভাগ | native_name_lang = bn | settlement_type = Division | image_map = বাংলাদেশে ময়মনসিংহ বিভাগ.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Map of Bangladesh showing Mymensingh Division | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | established_title = Established | established_date = | seat_type = Capital | seat = | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 10,485 | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 11,370,000 | population_as_of = 2011 census | population_density_km2 = auto | population_note = | timezone1 = BST | utc_offset1 = +6 | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Mymensingh Division is an administrative division of Bangladesh. The division has an area of 10,485 km², and a population of 11,370,000. The division of Mymensingh is next to the Indian state of Meghalaya to the north, Dhaka Division on the south, Sylhet Division to the east, Rangpur and Rajshahi Division to the west.
title: Mymensingh Division
